story.hline: IPL games to go ahead as teams wait to hear from BCCI
story.intro: 14 league games and 4 playoff matches are yet to be played in IPL 2025

story.hline: A blot on Rabada's record, but no more than that
story.intro: South Africans are understandably disappointed at their premier pacer's irresponsibility but they don't want Rabada to get any more punishment.

story.hline: Qualification scenarios: Titans inch closer to playoff spot

story.hline: SLC hire R Sridhar for a 10-day stint
story.intro: The former India fielding coach will work with both the men's and women's team across levels to improve Sri Lanka's fielding standards
story.seoHeadline: Sri Lanka Cricket hire R Sridhar for a 10-day stint

coverImage.caption: Sridhar will work with the players for 10 days.

story.hline: BCB anticipate Taskin Ahmed to be fit for Sri Lanka series
story.intro: The fast-bowler had recently flown to London to consult a group of specialists regarding his ongoing Achilles tendon issues

story.hline: After washout, focus on Uppal stadium ahead of play-offs
story.intro: The ground conditions and inadequate drainage have raised concerns about the venue's readiness ahead of the IPL play-offs
